snippet.title: PROFESSOR LAYTON and The New World of Steam - Nintendo Direct 2.8.2023
snippet.description:
Professor Layton is back to face new puzzles in PROFESSOR LAYTON and The New World of Steam! Coming to Nintendo Switch.

#ProfessorLayton #NintendoSwitch #NintendoDirect

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot
